data.text: How Safe to Mount a Fork Cage on a Carbon Fork?

Hi All, How safe to attach and load something like fork cage (see the pictures) to the Carbon fork which doesn't have that special bosses on the fork. Just plain Carbon fork (for example Cannondale Topstone 2 2021) Would you attach something like it or maybe already have it attached? Cheers
This has been designed for mtb forks, which are bigger and have a little bit different shape. If someone have already tested this, I need to know too please.

data.text: Hi Igr, I attached budget fork cages from Planet X to the plain carbon forks on my road bike. I covered the forks in clear adhesive film to protect the carbon and also used adhesive foam strips for added protection under the heavy duty cable ties that I used to attach the cages to the fork. In almost 1000 miles around Scotland and the Outer Hebrides nothing came loose or became detached. Hope this helps.
